name: BattleCommence: RPG Battle Microkernel
short_description: BattleCommence is a Turn-Based RPG Battle Microkernel inspired by the Final Fantasy Series. This is not a graphical project, however, there will be examples in the future using simple graphics. Developed to be Fully Portable (Where C is available).
